generated_body: If you click on the article titled "LA Sweep: Angels' Trout, Dodgers' Bellinger win MVP Awards," you may expect to find an overview of the recent MVP awards presented to baseball stars Mike Trout of the Los Angeles Angels and Cody Bellinger of the Los Angeles Dodgers.
